attributes.action: Make prescriptions free for people on contributions based jobseekers allowance
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The world is in a recession and honest hardworking people who have worked all their lives, paying every bill,Tax and NI that is thrown their way find themselves loosing their jobs through no fault of their own. They are having to struggle to find a job, support their families and pay bills all on the tiny amount of jobseekers they are able to claim. Prescriptions and other house costs are free to income based - mostly for people who have never had a job so why not the people who have worked to build up this country! Why not give something back and look after us in our time of need!
